values.title: Oscar Wilde
values.desc: Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination

values.title: Dorothy Parker
values.desc: If you want to know what God thinks of money just look at the people he gave it to

values.title: Oprah Winfrey
values.desc: Everyone wants to ride with you in the limo but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down

values.title: Benjamin Franklin
values.desc: A Penny Saved is a Penny Earned

values.title: Tony DeLiso
values.desc: Keep your best wishes close to your heart and watch what happens

values.title: Virginia Woolf
values.desc: A woman must have money and a room of her own if she is to write fiction

values.title: Epictetus
values.desc: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants

values.title: Anne Herbert
values.desc: Libraries will get you through times of no money better than money will get you through times of no libraries

values.title: Groucho Marx
values.desc: While money cant buy happiness, it certainly lets you choose your own form of misery

values.title: Will Rogers
values.desc: Too many people spend money they havent earned to buy things they dont want to impress people that they dont like

values.title: Albert Einstein
values.desc: The hardest thing in the world to understand is the income tax

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Minds are like flowers they only open when the time is right

values.title: Franoise Sagan
values.desc: Money may not buy happiness, but Id rather cry in a Jaguar than on a bus

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: The discontent and frustration that you feel is entirely your own creation

values.title: Michael Cunningham
values.desc: Beauty is a whore, I like money better

values.title: Tony DeLiso
values.desc: Happiness is part of who we are Joy is the feeling
